responses.title: By the honor of the ancients.
This my friends, is in the bag.

This will only hurt a lot.

The world shall end in fire.
Face the knight, face the dragon.
Face the knight, face the dragon.
Live by the sword, die by the dragon.
Live by the sword, die by the dragon.
Welcome to the dead of night.
Welcome to the dead of night.
Let my face be the last thing you see.
Let my face be the last thing you see.
May the eldwyrms carry you to rest.
